body:
Release Notes

Network360 Team

The Network360 Team is excited that this release includes an Enhancement for Rate Analytics. The release also includes fixes for Adequacy, Accessibility and Specification.

Enhancements

Rate Analytics Plan Intelligence
  • To enhance the user experience and production, we have increased the total billing codes from 3,847 to 4,078. There are no longer any billing codes listed without a descriptions.

Fixes

Adequacy
  • Now, when you use the Global CMS Medicare Advantage 2024 specification in an Adequacy analysis, results generate as expected.
Accessibility
  • Now, when you use the Global CMS Medicare Advantage 2024 specification in an Adequacy analysis, results generate as expected.
Specification
  • Now, when you use the Global CMS Medicare Advantage 2024 specification in an Adequacy analysis, results generate as expected.
